effect_entries.effect: Lowers the target's Defense by one stage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Lowers the target's Defense by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
Le lanceur fait les gros yeux à l’ennemi pour
l’intimider et baisser sa Défense.

Reduces the foe's
DEFENSE.

Reduces the foe's
DEFENSE.

Frightens the foe with a
leer to lower DEFENSE.

Frightens the foe with a
leer to lower DEFENSE.

The foe is given an
intimidating look
that lowers its
DEFENSE stat.

The foe is given an
intimidating leer with
sharp eyes.
The target’s Defense
stat is reduced.

The foe is given an
intimidating leer with
sharp eyes.
The target’s Defense
stat is reduced.

The foe is given an
intimidating leer with
sharp eyes.
The target’s Defense
stat is reduced.

Le lanceur fait les gros yeux à l’ennemi
pour l’intimider et baisser sa Défense.

The opposing team gains an intimidating
leer with sharp eyes. The opposing team’s
Defense stats are reduced.

The user gains an intimidating leer with
sharp eyes. The opposing team’s
Defense stats are reduced.

するどい　めつきで　おびえさせて
あいての　ぼうぎょを　さげる。

날카로운 눈초리로 겁을 주어
상대의 방어를 떨어뜨린다.

Le lanceur fait les gros yeux à l’ennemi pour
l’intimider et baisser sa Défense.

Gegnerischer Verteidigungs-Wert wird
durch angsteinflößenden Blick gesenkt.
Intimida a los rivales para bajar su Defensa.

Terrorizza i nemici intorno con uno sguardo
fulminante e intimidatorio, riducendone la Difesa.

The user gives opposing Pokémon
an intimidating leer that lowers the Defense stat.

鋭い　目つきで　おびえさせて
相手の　防御を　さげる。

するどい　めつきで　おびえさせて
あいての　ぼうぎょを　さげる。
